title: Get Gortash's Netherstone
content:
ning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Get Gortash's Netherstone Objectives

Head west on the road to Baldur's Gate

Gortash left for Baldur's Gate. We should go after him.

Baldur's Gate is near. We should find out where Gortash is

Find Gortash in Wyrm's Rock Fortress.

We discovered that Gortash is in Wyrm's Rock Fortress, where he will be sworn in as an Archduke of Baldur's Gate. We need to make our way there.

Enter the Audience Hall.

We made it to Wyrm's Rock Fortress and
